name: maze game (bitmapkid)
description:
hello, i am bitmapkid and i made this game about mazes. before you download and play this game, please know that it is going to be disrespectful to your time. i doubt you will find much fun in it, and i also doubt that you will find any sense of satisfaction from playing it. what i mean is--i'll tell you now--there's nothing waiting for you at the end; no conclusion or anything of value other than whatever it is you yourself might feel for having completed something.

if you do decide to play this game, please comment how far you get before giving up. i'm curious if anyone is actually willing to persevere through something so frustrating and unrewarding for no payoff.

if you like the music, there's more here: https://soundcloud.com/bitmapkid
